nodes.text: Pangorins were a species that could be found in grottoes in a zoo on Sarini Island, Chandrila. During the year 5 ABY, Brentin, Temmin and Norra Wexley witnessed pangorins in their grottoes during a visit to the Sarini Island zoo.
Pangorins were first mentioned in Aftermath: Life Debt, a novel by Chuck Wendig, which was released on July 12, 2016.
